title: Carnivorous plants
brief_description: Shows the unusual structure and behaviour of the Venus Flytrap, Trumpet Plant, Cobra Plant, Pitcher Plant, Sundew Plant and Utricularia, which are all species of carnivorous plants. Suitable for upper primary, lower and middle secondary levels.
